intro: Heart-pounding 2D action returns! Play until your fingers hurt and zombie heads explode! Survive while drenched in blood. The bloody feast begins at your fingertips!
description:
Experience the ultimate in arcade-style thrills! Once you start, you can't stop! Use precise controls to blow zombie heads off and take down bosses. Prepare for a shocking ending!

・Intense, sweaty action awaits you
・Destroy zombies until your fingers shake! Survive in a bloody world!
・Non-stop shocking action! Blast your way through endless hordes of zombies!
・Extreme 2D side-scrolling action with flying blood!
・Brutal combat with exploding zombie heads and flying body parts
・Clear stages with precise zombie-slaying controls
・Unleash an arsenal of weapons and items to destroy zombies
・Discover hidden items and build your ultimate survival strategy
・Upgrade your character with each stage you complete
・Feel the rush of leveling up!
・Craft your unique strategy with a variety of upgrades: enhance weapons, boost health, and more!
・Develop new tactics to defeat the zombies in each stage!

Pure arcade addiction - once you start, you can't put it down!
Join Anne on her desperate journey to save her loved ones. Are you ready for this dangerous adventure?
Featuring non-stop action, a gripping story and breathtaking twists, this game delivers the authentic arcade experience right to your Switch. Get ready for a blood-soaked thrill ride you won't forget!  Defeat countless zombies and bosses, complete the final stage, and experience a heart-pounding twist ending! Download now and immerse yourself in a heart-pounding world of zombie-slaying action!

Prologue
Anne, a former member of a special forces unit, married a DJ who was also in the same unit, and they led a peaceful life after retiring from the army. Even in the midst of the zombie apocalypse, they lived a relatively peaceful life. But was it this peace that was the problem? One day, the mad scientist Dr. Crazy kidnaps DJ and Anne's life is turned upside down. To get her beloved husband back, Anne embarks on a daring rescue mission... Will she be able to rescue DJ safely?
